name: table
description: This is a dinner table in the center of the dining room.

facts.description: There is a lot of food on the table. List some examples.
On the table are silver cutlery and expansive plates. Describe them in detail.
It seems like a large dinner party took place here not long ago. But they did not finish eating.
The table is handmade designer furniture from Italy. Describe its looks and feels.
There are other objects which you typically find on a dinner table. List them.

interactions.description: The player eats some of the food.
interactions.effect: It is cold but it still tastes good. Describe the taste.

interactions.description: He takes some of the plates or cutlery.
interactions.effect: He puts them in his brief case for later examination.

interactions.description: He takes some of the food.
interactions.effect: He wraps it in tinfoil and puts it into his brief case.

interactions.description: He destroys some of the objects on the table.
interactions.effect: If it is something sharp or heavy, he hurts himself slightly. Otherwise everything is okay.

interactions.description: He tries to turn over or destroy the table.
interactions.effect: He fails, it is too heavy and robust.
